title: Create a Reusable User Profile Card Component
description:
Create a reusable UserProfileCard component that displays user information with proper prop handling and conditional rendering.

**Requirements:**
1. Create a `UserProfileCard` component that accepts props:
   - `name` (string, required)
   - `email` (string, required)
   - `avatarUrl` (string, optional - shows default if not provided)
   - `bio` (string, optional)
   - `isOnline` (boolean, optional - shows online status)
   - `followersCount` (number, optional)
   - `onFollow` (function, optional - callback for follow button)
2. The component should display:
   - User avatar (image or default placeholder)
   - User name in a heading
   - Email address
   - Bio text if provided
   - Online status indicator (green dot if online)
   - Followers count if provided
   - Follow button if `onFollow` callback is provided
3. Implement proper prop validation and default values

**Component Structure:**
```jsx
<UserProfileCard
  name="John Doe"
  email="john@example.com"
  avatarUrl="https://example.com/avatar.jpg"
  bio="Software developer passionate about React"
  isOnline={true}
  followersCount={1234}
  onFollow={() => console.log('Followed!')}
/>
```

**Styling Requirements:**
- Card should have clean, modern design
- Avatar should be circular
- Online status should be a green dot
- Follow button should have hover effect
- Responsive layout

**Expected Behavior:**
- Component renders all provided information
- Missing optional props are handled gracefully
- Online status shows only when `isOnline` is true
- Follow button only appears when `onFollow` is provided
- Default avatar shows when no `avatarUrl` is provided
